## Boston Housing example (from `BART` vignette)


```{r boston}

library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(BART)

Boston <- MASS::Boston

X <- Boston[, c(6, 13)]
y <- Boston$medv

bart_model <- wbart(x.train = X, 
                  y.train = y, 
                  nskip = 1000, 
                  ndpost = 1000,
                  nkeeptreedraws = 2) # keep only 2 mcmc iteration sum-of-trees

simple_trees <- as_tidytree(bart_model)

detailed_trees <- as_tidytree(bart_model, extra_cols = c("var", "cut", "leaf_value", "is_leaf"))

```
